label: 直衣姿
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The ordinary costume worn by a nobleman at the palace or when dressed up at home.  The level of formality could be varied: with a formal cap (kanmuri) it was more formal than with a hat (eboshi).  The dress cloak (nōshi) was tied on and worn over a gown (uchiki, akome, onzo, kinu) and shift (hitoe), with gathered trousers (sashinuki).[冠、烏帽子、直衣、袿、衵・袙、御衣、衣、単、指貫][RK]
